mean_cn: n. 香；焚香时的烟，香味；  vt. 使大怒；激怒
mean_en: a substance that is used often in religious ceremonies to produce a strong and pleasant smell when it is burned
word_etyma: in向内，进入+cense点燃，点亮→在内部点燃点亮的→incense香
sentence: The smell of the incense in the temple was so strong!
sentence_trans: 寺庙里的香的味道好浓烈啊！
